lines.text:
[trying to get everybody's attention]
Listen, now listen to me, everybody, this town is in danger. Now, several people have been killed already! Now we - we had to make this noise so you would listen to us, so we could warn you!
If we're in trouble, where're the police?

[sees Steve]
You, boy, this time you really hanged yourself.
Now, look, Sarge. Just give me a chance to talk to them, that's all.
I don't know what kind of stunt it is you're pulling here, but whatever it is, it's going to stop right now!
Here comes Dave!
What's going on here, Jim? Steve!
Dave, make them listen to me. There IS a monster! We saw it again at dad's store, and it's bigger now!
Your story's gotten bigger now, kid.
Dave, look at me! Do I look like somebody's playing a practical joke? Am I laughing, or am I scared stiff?
He's telling the truth.
[after throwing acid on the Blob]
Doctor, nothing will stop it!
Just because some kid smacks into your wife on the turnpike doesn't make it a crime to be 17 years old.
[On the radio to Washington]
I think you should send us the biggest transport plane you have, and take this thing to the Arctic or somewhere and drop it where it will never thaw.
[last lines]
At least we've got it stopped.
Yeah, as long as the Arctic stays cold.

[hysterical after they just escaped the Blob]
Steve... our parents think we're in bed, at home, safe, asleep, sound.

[comes out of the market where Steve told everyone the Blob was]
There's nobody in here but us monsters...

[a screaming crowd comes running around the corner]
Dave! It's at the theater!

[runs into the theater with a shotgun; after firing three shots, retreats as Jim prepares to go in]
Don't go in, Jim! This won't do any good! It's the most horrible thing I've ever seen in my life. Come on, we've got to clear this area!

[the air raid siren blows]
Henry, Danny's gone!

[trying to get an answer on the phone]
What?
And Jane too!
[Henry hangs up and meets her at the stairs]
Well now calm down...
I looked in both their rooms, they're both gone!
Are you sure?
Yes! Yes!
Well maybe they're down here.
[turns on the living room lights, Danny's asleep on the couch]
Here's Danny!

[running behind him]
Danny! What're you doing here?
I'm... guarding you.
Guarding us? Guarding us against what, darling?
I don't know.
Is everyone in this whole town gone crazy? Danny, do you know where Jane is?
She's just gone.

[stands up]
I'm going to get to the bottom of this at once.
[hears dog barking]
I bet there is a house somewhere.

[laughs]
It doesn't sound like a house. It sounds like a dog.
How do you get people to protect themselves from something they don't believe in?
Dad, it isn't vandalism! Doctor Hallen is dead, and he was killed by some sort of a monster! Now, I know because I saw it, Dad.
All right, Steve. You made us waste our 80 cents, now what gives?
[all the teenagers demand to know what's going on]
Would you believe me if I told you there was something inside of that rock we found tonight? Something that could wipe out this whole town?

[all the teenagers laugh]
Hey, knock it off! Go ahead, Steve.
I saw this thing kill Doc Hallen tonight.
[all the kids are shocked]
That's right.
What is it?
I don't know, but one thing's for certain, if it can kill Doctor Hallen, it can kill somebody else.
Well what do you want us to do, Steve?
All right, we're going to find this thing, and we're going to make people believe us.
Alright, we tried to do it the right way, now we're going to wake this town up ourselves.
Yeah, but how?
Yeah, how?
Any way we can think of.
[outside supermarket]

[friends come running up to he and Jane]
Where have you kids been? It's in there! It's in there! I wish I were kidding. It's in there!
Dave! Doc Hallen's been killed!
Doc Hallen? What happened?
It's over at his place! You've gotta come now!
Now wait a minute, Steve. Tell us what happened.
I'm trying to tell you - now this thing has killed the Doc.
Well what was it? Out with it, kid!
Well it's kind of a - kind of a mass. It keeps getting bigger and bigger.
Come on, Steve, make sense.
I know, I know! Look, Dave, you gotta see this thing to believe what I'm telling you.
Maybe this thing you saw was a - monster?
Yeah, maybe it was. I don't know.
Hold on, Jim. Now what is this, Steve? A little while ago it was driving backwards, now it's monsters.
He's not making it up, Dave, honest!
Dave, I'm not kidding you. I swear, come out to the Doc's. You can see it for yourself.
You're crazy if you go. Can't you see it's a gag?
He says Doc Hallen's dead, Jim. We've got to check it out.
Well then, young lady, do you mind telling me where you've been spending the evening?
Daddy, it's all right.

[sarcastically]
Oh, yes, everything's fine, I always stop by the police station in the middle of the night to pick up my daughter. Don't you realize that by morning this will be all over town?
Well we were just trying to warn people.
After all, I am the principal at the high school.
[to Steve]
Young man, this is the last time you're going to take my daughter out!
Steve didn't do anything wrong!

[on the phone]
Kate? It's Dr. Hallen, I'm still at the office... something's come up. I need you back here right away. No, you've got to come back, Kate. There's a man here with some sort of a parasite on his arm, assimilating his flesh at a frightening speed. I may have to get ahead of it and amputate. No... I don't know what it is or where it came from.
Mrs. Porter, did you hear any gunshots tonight?
I sure did, tonight and every other night. The people downstairs have them old movies on their televisions. There's always some shooting or screaming.
You sure you want to go with me?
Yes.
I wouldn't give much for our chances, us running around in the middle of the night, looking for something that if we found it, it might kill us.

[as the young folk return from the school with the CO2 fire extinguishers]
Hey! Here come the kids back!

[to Dave as she's about to clean up the doctor's office]
Can't I just dust around the fingerprints?
Lieutenant, I'll have you know that Steve isn't in the habit of telling lies. If he says he's not mixed up in this vandalism thing, you can be sure it's the truth.

[catches Jane sneaking down the stairs]
Hey! Where're you going?
Shhh, come here, Danny, shhhhhh.
Where are you going?
I've got something very important to do, Danny, but it's got to be a secret.
Will you be back pretty soon?
Well I don't know.
Aren't you afraid to go out by yourself?
You're right, I guess I am, Danny.
I'm not afraid, I'll guard you.
Oh no, Danny, you've got a bigger job to do, I need you to guard Mommy and Daddy for me.
Oh they don't need guarding.

[Steve stops outside the phone booth to call the police]
Go on!
You talk to them, Tony.
Me? Why me?
I'm supposed to be home asleep, if they think I'm running around loose, they'll never believe us.
Yeah yeah, here's a dime. Come on, come on!
What'll I say?
Ask for Dave, and listen Tony, you give it to him straight. Tell him to get out to this store quick! You tell him to bring every piece of hardware he can find in the police station!
